content: keeping the first few snug this marks the round 3 k1 m1l k3 5 beginning of the round 3 stitches unworked they re round 4 k3 m1l k2 6 the first 3 stitches of the new round 28 stitches round 5 k5 m1l k1 7 knit 10 rounds then cut yarn divide stitches onto 2 round 6 k7 m1l 8 needles 14 & 14 but keep these stitches live they ll round 7 k1 m1l k7 9 be used to graft later round 8 k3 m1l k6 10 round 9 k5 m1l k5 11 round 10 k7 m1l k4 12 round 11 k 6 turn round 12 sl1 p 5 turn round 13 sl1 k 4 turn round 14 sl1 p 3 turn body round 15 sl1 k to end of round round 16 k 3 stitches cut yarn leave a bit of a tail you ll make 2 cones join them together and knit the you ll use it to stitch the top shut divide to 2 needles body it has a few short row for that squishy korok 6 & 6 belly for the tiny secondary nub on branch 1 take the tail both legs are exactly the same as follows from your cast on pull it into the body draw it back to the outside of the work roughly where you want co 4 stitches the nub to be and then use it to pick up 2 stitches round 1 k all stitches side by side knit 1 row of 2 stitch icord and then round 2 k1 m1l k3 5 pass the yarn thru to bind off round 3 k3 m1l k2 6 round 4 k5 m1l k1 7 branch 2 round 5 k7 m1l 8 co 4 stitches round 6 k1 m1l k7 9 round 1 k all stitches round 7 k3 m1l k6 10 round 2 k1 m1l k3 5 round 8 k5 m1l k5 11 round 3 k3 m1l k2 6 round 9 k7 m1l k4 12 round 4 k5 m1l k1 7 round 5 k7 m1l 8 for leg 1 cut the yarn leaving a tail for stitching the round 6 k1 m1l k7 9 bottom closed divide 6 & 6 just like those branches round 7 k3 m1l k6 10 from earlier for leg 2 move straight to joining legs round 8 k5 m1l k5 11 round 9 k7 m1l k4 12 joining legs round 10 k 6 turn with leg 2 co 6 stitches using the live yarn and the round 11 sl1 p 5 turn backwards loop method then knit all leg 1 stitches round 12 sl1 k 4 turn to join everything together at the end of leg 1 co 6 more stitches then knit the last 6 stitches from leg round 1 k all stitches 2 this marks the beginning of the round 36 stitches round 2 k2tog k1 k2tog k1 4 round 3 k all stitches rounds 1-5 k all stitches thread yarn thru all stitches
